attributes.action: Stop the third runway at Heathrow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heathrow airport is congested to the point of oblivion. There is no more capacity to take more passengers. Terminal 5 will add to the passenger congestion, not remove it, as there is only a limited amount of space to access the airport or park on it. Adding a further runway, just to be "ahead of Paris or Schipol" is ludicrous in the extreme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
